text:
[Verse]
Morning sun it wakes me up
Fresh dew on the ground
Birds are singing songs of love
In this small quiet town

[Verse 2]
Breath of air so cool and clean
Whispers through the trees
Smiling faces all around
Life's gentle breeze

[Chorus]
Underneath the morning sun
We all become one
Dancing in the rays of light
Morning feels so right

[Verse 3]
Golden beams across my face
Warmth that fills my heart
Every day a new embrace
A brand new start

[Chorus]
Underneath the morning sun
We all become one
Dancing in the rays of light
Morning feels so right

[Bridge]
Let it shine so bright and clear
Washing away all the fear
Morning sun we'll hold you near
Morning sun you're here
title: Morning Sun
